tool_description: Identifies and extracts in-text citations and references from academic documents, supporting multiple citation styles.

document_text.description: Full text content of the document

citation_style.description: Citation style to detect: APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, or Vancouver

error_messages: Empty document: Document text cannot be empty.
Unsupported citation style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, Vancouver].
No citations found: The document does not contain detectable citations in the specified style.
usage: Provide the document_text and specify the citation_style to extract all citations and references from the document.

in_text_citations.description: List of in-text citations found in the document

reference_list.description: List of references from bibliography section
